ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] A question for you all
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to let you know if you use your old login name and password, chances are you will get your old characters back. Luis ...
ygData.messageBody:
Just to let you know if you use your old login name
and password, chances are you will get your old
characters back.

Luis
--- "John Russo <john_russo2000@...>"
<john_russo2000@...> wrote:
> Thanks I think I will do that. I wish I would have
> not lost my other
> discs :o(. Oh well live and learn :o)
>
> John Russo
>
